getEta

public double getEta()
Description copied from interface: HepRepPoint
Returns coordinate with respect to vertex at (0, 0, 0).

Specified by:
getEta in interface HepRepPoint
Returns:
eta = -0.5*clog((1.-ct)/(1.+ct)), where ct = .cos(getTheta(dx, dy, dz));
